title: What problems have you experienced with your car?

korean: 가장 당황스러웠던 건 겨울에 배터리가 방전됐을 때예요.
일주일 동안 차를 안 타고 뒀더니 시동이 안 걸리더라고요.
처음에는 뭐가 문제인지도 몰라서 진짜 당황했어요.
보험사에 전화해서 긴급출동 서비스 받았는데 한 시간 걸렸어요.
그때부터는 추울 때 일주일에 한 번은 시동 걸어줘야겠다고 생각했죠.
고속도로 달리다가 갑자기 '퍽' 소리 나면서 차가 기울더라고요.
다행히 갓길에 세울 수 있었는데 정말 무서웠어요.
스페어 타이어로 교체하는 법을 몰라서 견인차 불러야 했고.
요즘은 유튜브 보면서 기본적인 정비는 배워뒀어요.
엔진오일 교체 시기 놓쳐서 경고등 켜진 적도 있고.
차 관리가 생각보다 손이 많이 가더라고요.
english: The most flustered I've been was when the battery died in winter.
I left the car for a week without driving it, and then it wouldn't start.
At first, I didn't even know what the problem was, so I was really panicked.
I called the insurance company and got emergency service, but it took an hour.
Since then, I thought I should start the car at least once a week when it's cold.
I've also had a flat tire before.
I was driving on the highway when suddenly there was a 'pop' sound and the car tilted.
Fortunately I could pull over to the shoulder, but it was really scary.
I didn't know how to replace it with the spare tire, so I had to call a tow truck.
These days, I've learned basic maintenance by watching YouTube.
I've also had the warning light come on because I missed the engine oil change time.
Car maintenance requires more attention than I thought, you know.
